name: Burman Namibian Australian (Topaz, Quartz & Opal)
description:
Mixed Mineral Series

This particular stone represents solitude in tribute to my fellow HEN friends, acquaintances, and those I haven’t met. To be surrounded by and interact with so many, yet troubled at times with the feeling of isolation.

The second meaning deals with race and identity. Minerals from countries are represented and identifiable in one figure representing all and none. A diaspora entity with recognizable physical characteristic always on display can be seen as a beautiful mix for some and provoke counterproductive stereotypes in others.
